thread.title: Orlando police investigating officer-involved shooting at Wal-Mart where OPD officer was killed
thread.title_full: Orlando police investigating officer-involved shooting at Wal-Mart where OPD officer was killed

author: David Harris
title: Orlando police investigating officer-involved shooting at Wal-Mart where OPD officer was killed
text:
David Harris Caption Man barricaded in home off Semoran Boulevard 
An armed man barricaded himself in a home on Soria Avenue after an argument with his girlfriend, leading to an hours-long standoff with police. No one else is in the home.

An armed man barricaded himself in a home on Soria Avenue after an argument with his girlfriend, leading to an hours-long standoff with police. No one else is in the home. 
An armed man barricaded himself in a home on Soria Avenue after an argument with his girlfriend, leading to an hours-long standoff with police. No one else is in the home. Caption Great grandmother fights off would-be carjackers 
Police arrested two suspects in the attempted carjacking of a 72-year-old woman’s Ford Focus Saturday night, according to the Winter Garden Police Department. 
Police arrested two suspects in the attempted carjacking of a 72-year-old woman’s Ford Focus Saturday night, according to the Winter Garden Police Department. Caption Bill filed for third consecutive year to exonerate Groveland Four 
For the third year in a row, a bill has been filed asking for the exoneration of the Groveland Four. 
For the third year in a row, a bill has been filed asking for the exoneration of the Groveland Four. Caption Legislation would help first responders with PTSD 
Legislation under consideration would assist firefighters, paramedics and police officers trying to cope with PTSD in the wake of tragedy. (Video from Fox 35 Orlando) 
Legislation under consideration would assist firefighters, paramedics and police officers trying to cope with PTSD in the wake of tragedy. (Video from Fox 35 Orlando) Caption Markeith Loyd to judge: "I don't wanna talk to you." - Orlando News Now 
“I don’t wanna talk to you,” Loyd said after Ninth Judicial Circuit Chief Judge Frederick Lauten asked him a question about trial procedure.
